about

hi, i'm erix verkaaik (they/them).

i'm an award-winning gamemaker. i dabble in both digital and analogue games and like to make games about connection, exploration and discovery.

i'm passionate about small, alternative games and the communities that make them. in my spare time, i organise and run a local game dev meetup called Squiggly River.

get in contact via email: erikaverkaaik@gmail.com or find me elsewhere:

  • make rent.
